main event: A B-47 pilot reported a visual sighting of a round, white unidentified flying object over Kansas City on July 26, 1955.
interesting points: The object was leaving no contrails or exhaust., The pilot estimated the object's speed to be over 800 knots., The sighting lasted approximately one minute., The observation was made at an altitude of about 36,020 feet., Electronic contact with the object could not be established.
